name: Global uniques
uniques: Triggers a [Bountiful Harvest] event <upon discovering [Decontamination] technology>

Triggers a [Successful Missions] event <for [Deseret2] Civilizations> <upon turn end> <after turn number [29]> <with [2]% chance>

Triggers a [Comet Sighted] event <for [Major]> <upon turn end> <with [3]% chance> <after turn number [5]> <before the [Renaissance era]>
Triggers a [Comet Spotted] event <for [Major]> <upon turn end> <with [3]% chance> <after the [Renaissance era]>
Triggers a [Artists Protest the Eiffel Tower] event <for [Major]> <if [Eiffel Tower] is constructed>
Triggers a [A Destitute Noble] event <upon turn end> <with [3]% chance> <after turn number [20]> <before the [Industrial era]>
Triggers a [The Guest Star] event <for [Major]> <upon turn end>  <after turn number [164]> <before turn number [166]>
Triggers a [Solar Eclipse] event <for [Major]> <upon turn end> <with [3]% chance> <after turn number [5]> <before the [Renaissance era]>
